description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Caramel Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Caramel slice,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Easter leftovers,Quick & easy dessert
name: Chocolate Caramel Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Crumble biscuits into a food processor. Process until crumbs are fine. Add butter and process until crumbs are wet.
Line a 20x30cm cake tin with baking paper. Press mixture firmly into pan.
Empty caramel into bowl. Whisk until smooth. Pour over biscuit base then tap pan on bench to spread evenly. Bake for 10 minutes then remove from oven. Cool.

Melt chocolate with oil in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water. Spread chocolate over caramel layer and refrigerate until set. Cut into squares. Note: Melt chocolate over boiling simmer water and keep stirring so it doesn't burn.
